# Outcomes Army

This folder contains specialized outcome chatmodes for DevOps platform engineering. Each file represents a domain expert agent:

- `devops-automation.chatmode.md`: CI/CD & automation
- `kubernetes-ops.chatmode.md`: Kubernetes operations
- `gitops-cicd.chatmode.md`: GitOps & CI/CD
- `security-compliance.chatmode.md`: Security & compliance
- `monitoring-observability.chatmode.md`: Monitoring & observability
- `infrastructure-as-code.chatmode.md`: Infrastructure as Code

These agents are orchestrated by the main DevX Backstage chatmode for unified platform engineering.
